original: de ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: de ni rnam pa gnyis te /

analyzed: de'i bdag nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / de las byung ba'i mtshan nyid do //

analyzed: de'i bdag nyid gang la yod pa de ni de'i bdag nyid do // yang gang gi bdag nyid gang yin pa des ji ltar spong /

analyzed: gang zhig gang las skyes pa de de las byung ba'i mtshan nyid de ji ltar spong bar 'gyur /
translated: And how can that which originates from something be excluded from it?

original: de las yang gang zhig yin zhe na //
analyzed: de las yang gang zhig yin zhe na //

original: smras pa / nus dang shes pa'i bdag nyid pas //
analyzed: smras pa / nus dang shes pa'i bdag nyid pas //

original: de'i phyir mngon sum tshad ma yin //
analyzed: de'i phyir mngon sum tshad ma yin //
translated: therefore it is valid direct perception.

original: sngon po la sogs par rigs pa ni 'khrul ba ste //
analyzed: sngon po la sogs par rigs pa ni 'khrul ba ste //
translated: The reason that blue, etc. is mistaken is

original: de ni med par snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni med par snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it appears as if it were not.

original: gal te de med par yung snang ni //
analyzed: gal te de med par yung snang ni //
translated: If it appears as if it were not,

original: yod pa'i sngon po la sogs gang //
analyzed: yod pa'i sngon po la sogs gang //
translated: what is the blue, etc. that exists?

original: phyi rol ci yi phyir mi snang //
analyzed: phyi rol ci yi phyir mi snang //
translated: Why does not the external appear?

original: sngon po la sogs pa ni med pa ste /
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa ni med pa ste /

original: gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i phyir ro //

original: gzhan yang / phyi rol mngon sum min gzhan phyir //
analyzed: gzhan yang / phyi rol mngon sum min gzhan phyir //

original: 'gugs pa min phyir 'khrul ma yin //
analyzed: 'gugs pa min phyir 'khrul ma yin //

original: de la re zhig phyi rol gyi sngon po la sogs pa shes pa'i mngon sum du 'gyur ba mi 'os te /
analyzed: de la re zhig phyi rol gyi sngon po la sogs pa shes pa'i mngon sum du 'gyur ba mi 'os te /

analyzed: shes pa las don gzhan shes par gnas pa'i gsal ba dang 'brel ba med pa'i phyir ro //

original: 'khrul ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'khrul ba yang ma yin te /

analyzed: 'di ltar chur 'khrul ba'i yul smig rgyu yin nam chu yin /

analyzed: de la re zhig smig rgyu ni ma yin te /

original: de mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not appear as such.

original: @112b chu yang ma yin te /
analyzed: @112b chu yang ma yin te /

original: de la de med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la de med pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: chu med pa yang ma yin te /

original: gzhan na yod pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na /
analyzed: gzhan na yod pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na /

original: ma bkug par de ci ltar snang /
analyzed: ma bkug par de ci ltar snang /

original: bkug na ni 'khrul ba yin no //
analyzed: bkug na ni 'khrul ba yin no //

analyzed: bdag brgya byin la sogs pa yin no zhes sems pas kyang brgya byin la sogs pa thob par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de lta bas na ma bkug pa'i phyir yang phyi'i don la 'khrul pa mi rigs so //

original: slu ba med pa'i rnam pa mi rtog pa bshad zin to //
analyzed: slu ba med pa'i rnam pa mi rtog pa bshad zin to //
translated: The non-deceptive, non-conceptual has been explained.

original: rtog pa can bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: rtog pa can bshad par bya ste /
translated: The conceptual will now be explained.

original: rnam rtog kha cig don gzhan la ;
analyzed: rnam rtog kha cig don gzhan la ;
translated: Some concepts are non-deceptive with regard to other objects.

original: ; gang phyir zhen pas slu ba med //
analyzed: ; gang phyir zhen pas slu ba med //
translated: Because they are not deceptive through attachment.

original: rnam par rtog pa kha cig don gzhan la mi slu mod kyi don gzhan la yang dag par mi rigs pa ma yin nam //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa kha cig don gzhan la mi slu mod kyi don gzhan la yang dag par mi rigs pa ma yin nam //
translated: Some concepts are indeed non-deceptive with regard to other objects, but it is not reasonable that they are non-deceptive with regard to other objects.

original: de la ji ltar mi slu ba yin zhe na //
analyzed: de la ji ltar mi slu ba yin zhe na //

analyzed: mngon par zhen pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: don gzhan yang dag par ma rtogs kyang des gzhan pa yin te /
translated: Even though the other object is not understood, it is different from that.

original: de der de las byung ba'i gzhan dang brgyud pas 'brel ba yod de /
analyzed: de der de las byung ba'i gzhan dang brgyud pas 'brel ba yod de /
translated: It is related to that by way of origination from that.

original: de bas na de la mi slu ba yin no //
analyzed: de bas na de la mi slu ba yin no //

original: 'o na ni de la don gzhan snang ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'o na ni de la don gzhan snang ba ma yin te /

original: mi snang ba la yang zhen pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mi snang ba la yang zhen pa ma yin te /

original: shin tu thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shin tu thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the absurdity of the consequence.

original: de lta bas na de ji ltar zhen par 'gyur /
analyzed: de lta bas na de ji ltar zhen par 'gyur /
translated: Therefore, how can there be adherence to it?

original: 'di ni nyes pa med de ;
analyzed: 'di ni nyes pa med de ;
translated: There is no fault here.

original: ba lang ma yin pa las ldog pa ni rnam par rtog pa la snang ste /
analyzed: ba lang ma yin pa las ldog pa ni rnam par rtog pa la snang ste /
translated: The exclusion of non-cow is manifested in the conceptual cognition.

original: de khra bo la yang yod pas de la yang dag par rig pa la zhen par rigs so //
analyzed: de khra bo la yang yod pas de la yang dag par rig pa la zhen par rigs so //
translated: Since it exists in the variegated, it is reasonable to adhere to it in the cognition of the real.

original: don dang shes pa shin tu tha dad pa'i phyir de gnyis ngo bo gcig pa ma yin no zhes zer na /
analyzed: don dang shes pa shin tu tha dad pa'i phyir de gnyis ngo bo gcig pa ma yin no zhes zer na /
translated: If it is said that the two are not identical in nature because the object and the cognition are completely different,

original: de nyid med phyir brdzun pa ni //
analyzed: de nyid med phyir brdzun pa ni //
translated: it is false because of the non-existence of that.

original: ji ltar snang bzhin rnam par gzhag / sgra dang rnam par rtog pa'i don gnyis ni brdzun pa yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar snang bzhin rnam par gzhag / sgra dang rnam par rtog pa'i don gnyis ni brdzun pa yin te /
translated: The two objects of sound and conceptual thought are false,

original: brdzun pa la ni de kho na nyid med do //
analyzed: brdzun pa la ni de kho na nyid med do //
translated: and in the false there is no reality.

original: ji ltar rtogs pa 'ba' zhig de'i de kho na yin gyi /
analyzed: ji ltar rtogs pa 'ba' zhig de'i de kho na yin gyi /
translated: Only the realization is its reality,

original: ji lta ba bzhin de kho na nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin de kho na nyid ma yin no //
translated: but not the reality as it is.

original: ba lang gi rnam par rtog pa las ba lang ma yin pa las ldog pa rtogs pa yod pas /
analyzed: ba lang gi rnam par rtog pa las ba lang ma yin pa las ldog pa rtogs pa yod pas /
translated: Since the cow is realized as the opposite of the non-cow in conceptual thought,

original: 'di la rigs pas gnod pa med do //
analyzed: 'di la rigs pas gnod pa med do //
translated: there is no logical fault here.

original: dpe bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: dpe bstan par bya ste /
translated: An example is taught:

original: ji bzhin yang dag dran pa dang // ji ltar mngon sum rjes skyes ni //
analyzed: ji bzhin yang dag dran pa dang // ji ltar mngon sum rjes skyes ni //
translated: Correct memory and what arises after direct perception,

original: yang dag par dran pa ni yang dag par dran pa'o //üîΩmngon sum gyi rjes las skyes zhes bya ba ni mngon sum gyi stobs las skyes pa'i rnam @113a * //
analyzed: yang dag par dran pa ni yang dag par dran pa'o // mngon sum gyi rjes las skyes zhes bya ba ni mngon sum gyi stobs las skyes pa'i rnam @113a * //
translated: Correct memory is memory of what is correct.

original: par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: par rtog pa'o //
translated: What arises after direct perception is conceptual thought that arises from the power of direct perception.

original: de yang tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: That is also not a valid cognition,

original: de dag gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it grasps subject and object.

original: gal te yang rnam par rtog pa 'di dag mi slu ba tsam gyis ni tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te yang rnam par rtog pa 'di dag mi slu ba tsam gyis ni tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: If you think that these conceptual consciousnesses are not valid cognitions because they are merely nondeceptive,

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩji ltar gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i phyir dran pa tshad ma ma yin pa de bzhin du mngon sum gyi rjes las skyes pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i yang yin te /

translated: then they are not valid cognitions because they apprehend a thing that is not there.

original: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Just as memory is not a valid cognition because it apprehends a thing that is not there, so too is a conceptual consciousness that arises after direct perception because there is no difference.

original: rnam par mi rtog pas dngos po bzung nas de'i rjes las skyes pa'i rnam par rtog pas rigs la sogs pa'i khyad par 'dzin te /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pas dngos po bzung nas de'i rjes las skyes pa'i rnam par rtog pas rigs la sogs pa'i khyad par 'dzin te /
translated: After a nonconceptual consciousness apprehends a thing, a conceptual consciousness that arises later apprehends the thing‚Äôs attributes, such as its class.

original: rigs la sogs pa ba lang dang ba lang dkar por 'gro ba bzhin no zhes zer na /
analyzed: rigs la sogs pa ba lang dang ba lang dkar por 'gro ba bzhin no zhes zer na /
translated: This is just like the cow and the white cow.

original: thams cad rigs mthun pa dang / mi mthun pa las ldog pa'i dngos po'i ngo bo yin te /
analyzed: thams cad rigs mthun pa dang / mi mthun pa las ldog pa'i dngos po'i ngo bo yin te /
translated: All things are the nature of things that are similar and dissimilar.

original: de rnam par mi rtog pas gzung bas ba lang ma yin pa las ldog pa ba lang dang / dkar po ma yin pa las log pa'i dkar po dang / mi 'gro ba las log pa'i 'gro ba'i shes pas ji ltar ma bzung ba 'dzin pa yin /
analyzed: de rnam par mi rtog pas gzung bas ba lang ma yin pa las ldog pa ba lang dang / dkar po ma yin pa las log pa'i dkar po dang / mi 'gro ba las log pa'i 'gro ba'i shes pas ji ltar ma bzung ba 'dzin pa yin /
translated: Since it is non-conceptual, it apprehends the cow as the exclusion of the non-cow, the white as the exclusion of the non-white, and the moving as the exclusion of the non-moving.

original: gzhan yang ba lang mthong na ba lang yin no zhes nges pa ni mngon sum gyi tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang ba lang mthong na ba lang yin no zhes nges pa ni mngon sum gyi tshad ma ma yin te /

original: dngos po'i ngo bo yang dag par ma reg pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po'i ngo bo yang dag par ma reg pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not correctly contact the nature of the entity.

original: gal te reg na thams cad kyi bdag nyid nges par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te reg na thams cad kyi bdag nyid nges par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it did contact it, it would follow that the nature of all [entities] would be ascertained.

original: de bas na 'di ni yang dag par rig pa ma yin pa'i dngos po'i ngo bo la mngon par zhen pa yin pa'i phyir mngon sum gyi tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na 'di ni yang dag par rig pa ma yin pa'i dngos po'i ngo bo la mngon par zhen pa yin pa'i phyir mngon sum gyi tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, since it is the adherence to the nature of an entity that is not correctly known, it is not a valid cognition of perception.

original: rtags med pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: rtags med pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa yang ma yin no //
translated: And it is not inference, because there is no reason [for it].

original: ba lang ngo zhes pa'i rnam par rtog pas kyang ba lang gi rang gi ngo bo nyams su myong ba yin no zhes zer na /
analyzed: ba lang ngo zhes pa'i rnam par rtog pas kyang ba lang gi rang gi ngo bo nyams su myong ba yin no zhes zer na /
translated: Also, the thought cow experiences the own-nature of the cow.

original: yang rtar rnam par rtog pas ba lang mthong ba de bzhin no //
analyzed: yang rtar rnam par rtog pas ba lang mthong ba de bzhin no //
translated: Just as it is when one sees a cow with the thought horse.

original: rnam par mi rtog pas ba lang mthong ba ni rgyu ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir des bskyed pa dang ba lang gi rnam par rtog pa de bye brag med par 'khrul ba yin te /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pas ba lang mthong ba ni rgyu ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir des bskyed pa dang ba lang gi rnam par rtog pa de bye brag med par 'khrul ba yin te /
translated: When one sees a cow without conceptualization, that [thought] is confused without distinction with the thought cow that is produced by it, because the cause is not incomplete.

original: 'di ltar zhen pa dang yul gcig yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhen pa dang yul gcig yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is like this: the object is the same.

original: rtar rnam par rtog pa ma yin te bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtar rnam par rtog pa ma yin te bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not the thought horse, because it is the opposite.

original: de lta yin na rjes su dpag pa ni tshad ma yin par ni 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta yin na rjes su dpag pa ni tshad ma yin par ni 'gyur te /
translated: If that is so, then inference is a valid cognition, because

original: khyad par rjes 'gro med pa dang / spyi ni grub bsgrub pa yin //
analyzed: khyad par rjes 'gro med pa dang / spyi ni grub bsgrub pa yin //
translated: the non-pervasion of particulars and the establishment of universals

original: khyad par ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad par ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: Particulars are not the probandum,

original: de'i dpe la rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i @113b phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i dpe la rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i @113b phyir ro //
translated: because there is no pervasion of that example.

original: spyi nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin na ni de'i phyir gzung ba dang 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spyi nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin na ni de'i phyir gzung ba dang 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the universal itself is to be established, then it would be the apprehended object and the apprehending subject.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here, someone might say,

original: gang phyir khyad par 'dzin pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gang phyir khyad par 'dzin pa'i phyir //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause it apprehends a specific property,

original: rjes su dpag pa tshad ma yin //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa tshad ma yin //
translated: inference is a valid means of knowledge.

original: chos can ma 'brel rnam gcod pas //
analyzed: chos can ma 'brel rnam gcod pas //
translated: Because it excludes a non-related subject,

original: spyi yang 'dzin par byed pa yin //üîΩspyi ni grub pa sgrub pa yin ;
analyzed: spyi yang 'dzin par byed pa yin // spyi ni grub pa sgrub pa yin ;
translated: it also apprehends a universal.‚Äù

original: / zhes gang smras pa la /
analyzed: / zhes gang smras pa la /
translated: To this we reply,üîΩ‚ÄúIf a universal is established, it is established.‚Äù

original: spyi gang du grub /
analyzed: spyi gang du grub /
translated: Here, where is a universal established?

original: dpe'i chos can la zhes zer na /
analyzed: dpe'i chos can la zhes zer na /
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúIn the example subject,‚Äù

original: de lta yin na dpe'i chos can khyad par dang ldan pa de ji ltar spyir 'gyur /
analyzed: de lta yin na dpe'i chos can khyad par dang ldan pa de ji ltar spyir 'gyur /
translated: then how could the example subject, which possesses a specific property, be a universal?

original: 'on te de khyad par dang ldan pa yang spyi nyid yin na bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can gyi khyad par ji ltar spyi ma yin //
analyzed: 'on te de khyad par dang ldan pa yang spyi nyid yin na bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can gyi khyad par ji ltar spyi ma yin //
translated: But if that which possesses a specific property is a universal, then how could the specific property of the probandum subject not be a universal?

original: de bas na 'di ltar brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de bas na 'di ltar brjod par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, this should be stated:

original: gal te gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pas khyad par du byas pa dpe'i chos can nyid gang yin pa de nyid ni spyi yin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pas khyad par du byas pa dpe'i chos can nyid gang yin pa de nyid ni spyi yin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If the example-possessor is distinguished by the exclusion of what is other, then that very thing is a universal.

original: 'dir ma 'brel ba rnam par gcod pas khyad par du byas par 'dod de /
analyzed: 'dir ma 'brel ba rnam par gcod pas khyad par du byas par 'dod de /
translated: Here, we maintain that it is distinguished by the exclusion of what is unrelated.

original: dpe'i chos gang yin pa de nyid yang bdag cag ni ma 'brel bar rnam par gcod pas me'i phyogs khyad par du byas pas rjes su 'gro ba la nyes pa med do //
analyzed: dpe'i chos gang yin pa de nyid yang bdag cag ni ma 'brel bar rnam par gcod pas me'i phyogs khyad par du byas pas rjes su 'gro ba la nyes pa med do //
translated: That very thing which is the property of the example is distinguished by the exclusion of what is unrelated, and so there is no fault in the pervasion.

original: de nyid kyi phyir chos can dang ma 'brel ba rnam par gcod pas spyi yang bzung la de ma 'brel ba rnam par gcod pa'i mtshan nyid kyang khyad par 'dzin to //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir chos can dang ma 'brel ba rnam par gcod pas spyi yang bzung la de ma 'brel ba rnam par gcod pa'i mtshan nyid kyang khyad par 'dzin to //
translated: For that very reason, the universal is also apprehended by the exclusion of what is unrelated to the subject, and that which is unrelated is also distinguished by the definition of exclusion.

original: de bas na rjes su dpag pa ni tshad mar rigs te /
analyzed: de bas na rjes su dpag pa ni tshad mar rigs te /
translated: Therefore, inference is reasonable as a valid cognition,

original: ma bzung ba 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma bzung ba 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it apprehends what has not been apprehended.

original: gang de rang gi yul dang 'brel pa yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: gang de rang gi yul dang 'brel pa yin nam zhe na /
translated: Is it related to its own object?

original: de brgyud de las byung ba ni //
analyzed: de brgyud de las byung ba ni //
translated: It arises indirectly from that.

original: rjes dpag blo yi 'brel ba yin //
analyzed: rjes dpag blo yi 'brel ba yin //
translated: Inference is the relation of the mind.

original: brgyud pas rjes su dpag pa'i shes pa'i yul dang / de las byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa yin no //üîΩ'di ltar rjes su dpag par bya ba ni //üîΩrtags las shes te rjes dpag yin //
